description.value:
>@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.rpaon3jF3nCe5eP9]{Theorem (Ex)}

You have consumed enough fortifying chemical concoctions to have negated some of the fear you feel. You are immune to the @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.nywSVEeDvp1bk7L3]{Shaken} condition. If you are @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened}, you need not flee or fight, and if you are @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.BVdjvpucmvQU4cc1]{Panicked}, you need not drop all held items and flee, but you still cower if you are cornered. You still take the penalties associated with @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened} and @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.BVdjvpucmvQU4cc1]{Panicked} as normal.
